short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open any executed WAX transaction, edit and re-execute it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you have executed a transaction in the past, and want to either: execute it again, or edit something before executing it again, you can use this extension to easily submit it to wax-tools.naw.io and do just that.

Added support for bloks, waxblock and eosq; please let me know which others I should add (I need to explicitly ask permissions for these urls sadly).
